title: ConfigSettingContractEventsV0
description:
ConfigSettingContractEventsV0 is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct ConfigSettingContractEventsV0 { // Maximum size of events that a contract call can emit. uint32 txMaxContractEventsSizeBytes; // Fee for generating 1KB of contract events. int64 feeContractEvents1KB; }; ```
